subject: Indian History
topic: Bharat ka Samvidhan Nirman aur Constituent Assembly
question_en: When was the Constituent Assembly of India formed?
question_hi: भारतीय संविधान सभा का गठन कब हुआ था?
explanation_en: The Constituent Assembly of India was formed on 9 December 1946.
explanation_hi: भारतीय संविधान सभा का गठन 9 दिसंबर 1946 को हुआ था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bharat ka Samvidhan Nirman aur Constituent Assembly
question_en: How many members were there in the Constituent Assembly of India?
question_hi: भारतीय संविधान सभा में कितने सदस्य थे?
explanation_en: The Constituent Assembly of India had 395 members.
explanation_hi: भारतीय संविधान सभा में 395 सदस्य थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bharat ka Samvidhan Nirman aur Constituent Assembly
question_en: What was the name of the chairperson of the Drafting Committee of the Constituent Assembly?
question_hi: संविधान सभा के मसौदा समिति के अध्यक्ष का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar was the chairperson of the Drafting Committee of the Constituent Assembly.
explanation_hi: डॉ. बीआर अम्बेडकर संविधान सभा के मसौदा समिति के अध्यक्ष थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bharat ka Samvidhan Nirman aur Constituent Assembly
question_en: When did the Indian Constitution come into effect?
question_hi: भारतीय संविधान का प्रभावी होना कब हुआ था?
explanation_en: The Indian Constitution came into effect on 26 January 1950.
explanation_hi: भारतीय संविधान का प्रभावी होना 26 जनवरी 1950 को हुआ था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bharat ka Samvidhan Nirman aur Constituent Assembly
question_en: Who was the first Speaker of the Lok Sabha?
question_hi: लोकसभा के पहले अध्यक्ष कौन थे?
explanation_en: G.V. Mavalankar was the first Speaker of the Lok Sabha.
explanation_hi: जी.वी. मावलंकर लोकसभा के पहले अध्यक्ष थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bharat ka Samvidhan Nirman aur Constituent Assembly
question_en: How many articles are there in the Indian Constitution?
question_hi: भारतीय संविधान में कितने अनुच्छेद हैं?

subject: Indian History
topic: Bharat ka Samvidhan Nirman aur Constituent Assembly
question_en: Who was the President of the Constituent Assembly of India?
question_hi: भारतीय संविधान सभा के अध्यक्ष कौन थे?
explanation_en: Dr. Rajendra Prasad was the President of the Constituent Assembly of India.
explanation_hi: डॉ. राजेंद्र प्रसाद भारतीय संविधान सभा के अध्यक्ष थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bharat ka Samvidhan Nirman aur Constituent Assembly
question_en: When did the Drafting Committee submit its report to the Constituent Assembly?
question_hi: क्या मसौदा समिति ने संविधान सभा को अपनी रिपोर्ट जमा की थी?
explanation_en: The Drafting Committee submitted its report to the Constituent Assembly on 22 January 1948.
explanation_hi: क्या मसौदा समिति ने 22 जनवरी 1948 को संविधान सभा को अपनी रिपोर्ट जमा की थी।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bharat ka Samvidhan Nirman aur Constituent Assembly
question_en: Who was the Chief Draftsman of the Indian Constitution?
question_hi: भारतीय संविधान के प्रमुख मसौदा लेखक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar was the Chief Draftsman of the Indian Constitution.
explanation_hi: डॉ. बीआर अम्बेडकर भारतीय संविधान के प्रमुख मसौदा लेखक थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bharat ka Samvidhan Nirman aur Constituent Assembly
question_en: How many amendments have been made to the Indian Constitution since its adoption?
question_hi: भारतीय संविधान के ग्रहण के बाद से कितने संशोधन किए गए हैं?
explanation_en: 86 amendments have been made to the Indian Constitution since its adoption.
explanation_hi: भारतीय संविधान के ग्रहण के बाद से 86 संशोधन किए गए हैं।
